textAfterTable: Game of Thrones shirts are required wear for anyone whose blood runs Targaryen red. When blustery winter winds come calling, choose this black Game of Thrones hoodie to both proclaim your loyalty and keep from catching a cold. Like other House Targaryen merchandise, the hoodie features the distinctive sigil of a ferocious three-headed dragon in an attractively distressed red print. Walk through fireor just stay warm. The choice is yours. S M L XL XXL Body Length 28.5 29.5 30.5 31.5 32.5 Chest Width 21 23 24.5 26.5 27.5 Sleeve Length 34.5 35.5 36.5 37.5 38.5 REVIEW SNAPSHOT® by PowerReviews DA - HBO Game of Thrones Distressed Targaryen Sigil Hoodie -   4.5 (based on 85 reviews) 99% of respondents would recommend this to a friend.
